thread.section_title: Mattress.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mattress.ie | mattress.ie
thread.title: Michael Brophy

author: Michael Brophy
title: Michael Brophy
text: I have dealt with mattress.ie on a number of occasions and I can't fault them at all. Sales staff are extremely professional, knowledgeable and their customer service is flawless. Today, I am so happy with my new double divan bed, which was excellent value for money and just what I wanted. The delivery driver was prompt, arriving when agreed and so friendly and helpful. I have in the past and will continue to recommend mattress.ie to all my family and friends.
